trans-unit.source: Represents a collection that can contain many different types of permissions.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en samling som kan inneholde mange forskjellige typer tillatelser.

trans-unit.source: You can use PermissionSet to perform operations on several different permissions as a group.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke PermissionSet utføre operasjoner på flere andre tillatelser som en gruppe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> klassen med den angitte <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The `Unrestricted` state allows all permissions that implement the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission> interface, while `None` allows no permissions.
trans-unit.target: Den `Unrestricted` tilstand som tillater at alle tillatelser som implementerer den <xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission>grensesnittet mens `None` tillater ingen tillatelser.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.AddPermission%2A> on an empty <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> to define the set in greater detail.
trans-unit.target: Bruk <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.AddPermission%2A>på en tom <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>definere settet med flere detaljer.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.AddPermission%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the permission set's access to resources.
trans-unit.target: En av opplistingsverdiene som som angir tillatelsessettet tilgang til ressurser.

trans-unit.source: The state parameter is not a valid .
trans-unit.target: Den state parameteren er ikke en gyldig .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class with initial values taken from the permSet parameter.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den klasse startverdiene hentet fra den permSet parameteren.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> contains copies of the permissions contained in the specified <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.
trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>inneholder kopier av tillatelser i den angitte <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This is equivalent to <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.Copy%2A> when the `permSet` parameter is not `null`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Tilsvarer <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.Copy%2A>når den `permSet` -parameteren er ikke `null`.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.Copy%2A>

trans-unit.source: The set from which to take the value of the new <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to create an empty <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angi vil ta verdien for den nye fra <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref>, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> til å opprette en tom <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a specified permission to the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en angitt tillatelse til å den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If a permission of the same type as the added permission already exists in the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>, the new permission is the union of the existing permission object and the specified permission object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en tillatelse for den samme typen som tillagt tillatelsen allerede finnes i den <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>, den nye tillatelsen er Unionen av det eksisterende objektet tillatelse og angitte tillatelsen-objektet.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a permission that implements <xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission> is added to an <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState><xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>, the resulting union is the original `Unrestricted`<xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en tillatelse som implementerer for eksempel <xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission>legges til i en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState><xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>, den resulterende Unionen er opprinnelige `Unrestricted` <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet></xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission>

trans-unit.source: The permission to add.
trans-unit.target: Tillatelse til å legge til.

trans-unit.source: The union of the permission added and any permission of the same type that already exists in the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Unionen av tillatelsene som er lagt til og noen av samme type som allerede finnes i den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The method is called from a <xref href="System.Security.ReadOnlyPermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden kalles fra en <xref href="System.Security.ReadOnlyPermissionSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a specified permission to the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en angitt tillatelse til å den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The AddPermissionImpl method is the implementation for the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.AddPermission%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden AddPermissionImpl er implementering for den <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.AddPermission%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.AddPermission%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a permission of the same type as the added permission already exists in the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>, the new permission is the union of the existing permission object and the specified permission object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en tillatelse for den samme typen som tillagt tillatelsen allerede finnes i den <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>, den nye tillatelsen er Unionen av det eksisterende objektet tillatelse og angitte tillatelsen-objektet.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a permission that implements <xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission> is added to an <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState><xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>, the resulting union is the original `Unrestricted`<xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en tillatelse som implementerer for eksempel <xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission>legges til i en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState><xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>, den resulterende Unionen er opprinnelige `Unrestricted` <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet></xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission>

trans-unit.source: The permission to add.
trans-unit.target: Tillatelse til å legge til.

trans-unit.source: The union of the permission added and any permission of the same type that already exists in the , or if perm is .
trans-unit.target: Unionen av tillatelsene som er lagt til og noen av samme type som allerede finnes i den , eller Hvis perm er .

trans-unit.source: The method is called from a <xref href="System.Security.ReadOnlyPermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden kalles fra en <xref href="System.Security.ReadOnlyPermissionSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Declares that the calling code can access the resource protected by a permission demand through the code that calls this method, even if callers higher in the stack have not been granted permission to access the resource.
trans-unit.target: Angir at koden for å få tilgang til ressursen som er beskyttet av en tillatelse behov kode som kaller denne metoden, selv om brukere høyere i stakken ikke har fått tillatelse til å få tilgang til ressursen.

trans-unit.source: Using Assert can create security vulnerabilities.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av deklarering kan forårsake sikkerhetsproblemer.

trans-unit.source: This is the only way to assert multiple permissions at the same time within a frame because only one Assert can be active on a frame.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den eneste måten å Deklarer flere tillatelser samtidig i en ramme fordi bare én deklarering kan være aktive i en ramme.

trans-unit.source: Assert is only effective for granted permissions.
trans-unit.target: Deklarer gis bare effektiv for tillatelser.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.RevertAssert%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.RevertAll%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to cancel an active Assert.
trans-unit.target: Kall av <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.RevertAssert%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.RevertAll%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å avbryte en aktiv deklarering.</xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.RevertAll%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.RevertAssert%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Because calling the Assert method removes the requirement that all code in the call chain must be granted permission to access the specified resource, it can open up security vulnerabilities if used incorrectly or inappropriately.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Fordi å kalle metoden deklarering fjerner kravet at all kode i kall-kjede må gis tilgang til den angitte ressursen, som kan åpnes av sikkerhetsproblemer hvis brukt feil eller feil måte.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it should be used with great caution.
trans-unit.target: Den bør derfor brukes med fantastiske forsiktig.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> instance asserted has not been granted to the asserting code.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> forekomsten deklarert har ikke blitt gitt til asserting koden.

trans-unit.source: -or- There is already an active Assert for the current frame.
trans-unit.target: - eller - det finnes allerede en aktiv deklarering for gjeldende ramme.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> contains permissions that are not derived from <xref href="System.Security.CodeAccessPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> inneholder tillatelser som ikke er utledet fra <xref href="System.Security.CodeAccessPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> contains permissions that are not derived from <xref href="System.Security.CodeAccessPermission"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> inneholder tillatelser som ikke er utledet fra <xref href="System.Security.CodeAccessPermission"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts an encoded <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> from one XML encoding format to another XML encoding format.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer en kodet <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> fra en XML-formatet til en annen XML-formatet.

trans-unit.source: Do not use this method.
trans-unit.target: Ikke Bruk denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: A string representing one of the following encoding formats: ASCII, Unicode, or Binary.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer et av de følgende koding formatene: ASCII, Unicode eller Binary.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are "XMLASCII" or "XML", "XMLUNICODE", and "BINARY".
trans-unit.target: Mulige verdier er "XMLASCII" eller "XML", "XMLUNICODE" og "Binær".

trans-unit.source: An XML-encoded permission set.
trans-unit.target: Et XML-kodet angis.

trans-unit.source: A string representing one of the following encoding formats: ASCII, Unicode, or Binary.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer et av de følgende koding formatene: ASCII, Unicode eller Binary.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are "XMLASCII" or "XML", "XMLUNICODE", and "BINARY".
trans-unit.target: Mulige verdier er "XMLASCII" eller "XML", "XMLUNICODE" og "Binær".

trans-unit.source: An encrypted permission set with the specified output format.
trans-unit.target: En kryptert tilgang med angitt utdata-format.

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: I alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kopi av det <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A copy of a <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> represents the same access to resources as the original object.
trans-unit.target: En kopi av en <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>representerer samme tilgang til ressurser som det opprinnelige objektet.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the copy do not affect the original permission set.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i kopien påvirker ikke tillatelsessettet.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En kopi av det <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the permission objects of the set to the indicated location in an <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: Kopier tillatelse objektene satt til den angitte plasseringen i en <xref:System.Array>.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The target array to which to copy.
trans-unit.target: Målmatrisen som skal kopieres.

trans-unit.source: The starting position in the array to begin copying (zero based).
trans-unit.target: Startposisjonen i matrisen du vil kopiere (nullbasert).

trans-unit.source: The array parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The array parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The array parameter has more than one dimension.
trans-unit.target: Den array parameteren har mer enn én dimensjon.

trans-unit.source: The index parameter is out of the range of the array parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den index parameteren er utenfor området for den array parameteren.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of permission objects contained in the permission set.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall tillatelse objekter i tillatelsene.

trans-unit.source: In the `None` or `Unrestricted` state this returns zero, because no actual permission object instances are used.
trans-unit.target: I de `None` eller `Unrestricted` tilstand dette returnerer null, fordi ingen faktiske tillatelse objektforekomster brukes.

trans-unit.source: The number of permission objects contained in the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Antall tillatelse objekter i den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Forces a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> at run time if all callers higher in the call stack have not been granted the permissions specified by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger en <xref:System.Security.SecurityException>ved kjøretid hvis alle brukere har høyere i kallstakken ikke har fått tillatelsene som er angitt av den gjeldende forekomsten.</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: Use Demand on a <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> to ensure that all callers have all permissions in the set with one operation.
trans-unit.target: Bruk behov på en <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>slik at alle brukere får alle tillatelser i settet med én operasjon.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: The permissions of the code that calls this method are not examined; the check begins from the immediate caller of that code and proceeds up the stack.
trans-unit.target: Tillatelsene for koden som kaller opp denne metoden undersøkes ikke; sjekken begynner fra umiddelbar oppkalleren for denne koden og fortsetter av bunken.

trans-unit.source: The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack.
trans-unit.target: Kallstakken representeres vanligvis som voksende ned, slik at metoder høyere i kallstakken kalle metoder lavere i kallstakken.

trans-unit.source: Demand succeeds only if no <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Behov lykkes bare hvis ingen <xref:System.Security.SecurityException>forårsakes.</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> contains permissions that do not inherit from <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission>, the `Demand` methods of those permissions are called as well.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>inneholder tillatelser som ikke arver fra <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission>, `Demand` metoder for disse tillatelsene kalles også.</xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: A caller in the call chain does not have the permission demanded.
trans-unit.target: En oppringer i kallet kjeden har ikke tillatelse etterspørsel etter.

trans-unit.source: Causes any <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.Demand*> that passes through the calling code for a permission that has an intersection with a permission of a type contained in the current <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> to fail.
trans-unit.target: Gjør eventuelle <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.Demand*>som går gjennom prefiks for en tillatelse som har en skjæringspunktet med en tillatelse fra en type finnes i gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> mislykkes.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.Demand*>

trans-unit.source: This method prevents callers higher in the call stack from accessing the protected resource through the code that calls this method, even if those callers have been granted permission to access it.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden hindrer at brukere høyere i kallstakken tilgang til beskyttet ressursen kode som kaller denne metoden, selv om disse brukere har fått tilgang til den.

trans-unit.source: The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack.
trans-unit.target: Kallstakken representeres vanligvis som voksende ned, slik at metoder høyere i kallstakken kalle metoder lavere i kallstakken.

trans-unit.source: Deny can limit the liability of the programmer or help prevent accidental security vulnerabilities because it helps prevent the method that calls Deny from being used to access the resource protected by the denied permission.
trans-unit.target: Nekt kan begrense ansvaret i programmer eller forhindre utilsiktet sikkerhetsproblemer fordi den hindrer metoden som kaller Deny brukes til å få tilgang til ressursen som er beskyttet av nektet tilgang.

trans-unit.source: If a method calls Deny on a permission, and if a <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.Demand%2A> for that permission is invoked by a caller lower in the call stack, that security check fails when it reaches the Deny.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kaller en metode som skal avslås på en tillatelse, og hvis en <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.Demand%2A>for denne tillatelsen startes av en oppringer lavere i kallstakken, som sikkerhetskontrollen mislykkes når du avslå.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.Demand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Deny is ignored for a permission that is not granted because a demand for that permission cannot succeed.
trans-unit.target: Avslå ignoreres for en tillatelse ikke er gitt fordi et behov for å få denne tillatelsen ikke kan fullføres.

trans-unit.source: A previous call to Deny has already restricted the permissions for the current stack frame.
trans-unit.target: Et tidligere kall til Deny er allerede begrenset tillatelsene for gjeldende bunke ramme.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> or <xref href="System.Security.NamedPermissionSet"></xref> object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den angitte <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Security.NamedPermissionSet"> </xref> objektet som er lik gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Equality is determined by the permissions contained in the permission set specified by `obj`.
trans-unit.target: Likhet avgjøres av tillatelser i tillatelsen angitt angitt av `obj`.

trans-unit.source: `obj` can be either a <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> object or a <xref:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet> object.
trans-unit.target: `obj`kan være enten en <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>objektet eller <xref:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet>objektet.</xref:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: If `obj` is a <xref:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet>, the name and description are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `obj` er en <xref:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet>, navnet og beskrivelsen ignoreres.</xref:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Object.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Object.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Object.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som skal sammenlignes med gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det angitte objektet er lik gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> objekt; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: Rekonstruerer et sikkerhetsobjekt med en angitt tilstand fra en XML-koding.

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: XML-koding til å bruke Bygg opp sikkerhetsobjektet.

trans-unit.source: The et parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The et parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The et parameter is not a valid permission element.
trans-unit.target: Den et -parameteren er ikke et gyldig tillatelse-element.

trans-unit.source: -or- The et parameter's version number is not supported.
trans-unit.target: - eller - et versjonsnummeret for parameteren støttes ikke.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator for the permissions of the set.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en opplisting for tillatelse av settet.

trans-unit.source: Use the enumerator as an index to access individual permission objects in the set.
trans-unit.target: Bruk enumeratoren som en indeks for tilgang til individuelle tillatelse objekter i settet.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator object for the permissions of the set.
trans-unit.target: Et enumerator-objekt for tillatelse av settet.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator for the permissions of the set.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en opplisting for tillatelse av settet.

trans-unit.source: The GetEnumeratorImpl method is the implementation for the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.GetEnumerator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetEnumeratorImpl er implementering for den <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.GetEnumerator%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerator object for the permissions of the set.
trans-unit.target: Et enumerator-objekt for tillatelse av settet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash code for the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> object that is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: Henter en hash-kode for den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> objektet som passer for bruk i nummer algoritmer og data strukturer som en hash-tabell.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for two instances of the same permission set might be different, so a hash code should not be used to compare two <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> objects.
trans-unit.target: Hash-kode for to forekomster av de samme tillatelse kan være forskjellige, slik at en hash-kode ikke må brukes til å sammenligne to <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>objekter.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En hash-kode for gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a permission object of the specified type, if it exists in the set.
trans-unit.target: Henter kubeattributttillatelsesobjekt av den angitte typen hvis den finnes i settet.

trans-unit.source: The method returns `null` for an `Unrestricted`<xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden returnerer `null` for en `Unrestricted` <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: Although an `Unrestricted`<xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> effectively contains all permissions, it does not have any actual instances to return.
trans-unit.target: Selv om en `Unrestricted` <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>effektivt inneholder alle tillatelser, den ikke har noen faktiske forekomster skal returneres.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: The type of the desired permission object.
trans-unit.target: Objekttypen den ønskede tillatelse.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the permission object of the type specified by the permClass parameter contained in the , or if none exists.
trans-unit.target: En kopi av tillatelse objekt av typen som er angitt av den permClass parameter i den , eller Hvis ingen er registrert.

trans-unit.source: Gets a permission object of the specified type, if it exists in the set.
trans-unit.target: Henter kubeattributttillatelsesobjekt av den angitte typen hvis den finnes i settet.

trans-unit.source: The GetPermissionImpl method is the implementation for the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.GetPermission%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetPermissionImpl er implementering for den <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.GetPermission%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.GetPermission%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method returns `null` for an `Unrestricted`<xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden returnerer `null` for en `Unrestricted` <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: Although an `Unrestricted`<xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> effectively contains all permissions, it does not have any actual instances to return.
trans-unit.target: Selv om en `Unrestricted` <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>effektivt inneholder alle tillatelser, den ikke har noen faktiske forekomster skal returneres.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: The type of the permission object.
trans-unit.target: Typen tillatelse-objekt.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the permission object, of the type specified by the permClass parameter, contained in the , or if none exists.
trans-unit.target: En kopi av tillatelse-objekt av typen som er angitt av den permClass parameteren finnes i den , eller Hvis ingen er registrert.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a permission set that is the intersection of the current <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> and the specified <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter og returnerer en tillatelse som er angitt i skjæringspunktet mellom gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> og det angitte <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The intersection of two permission sets is a permission set that describes the set of operations they both describe in common.
trans-unit.target: Skjæringspunktet mellom to tillatelsessett er en tillatelsessett som beskriver operasjoner begge beskriver felles.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it represents the minimum permissions such that any demand that passes both permission sets also passes their intersection.
trans-unit.target: Spesielt, representerer den minimum tillatelser slik at behov som sender begge tillatelse angir også formidler skjæringspunktet.

trans-unit.source: For each type of permission that is present in both sets, the two instances of those permissions are intersected using the permission's `Intersect` method; the resulting permission is included in the resulting <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.
trans-unit.target: To forekomster av disse tillatelsene er snittes ved hjelp av tillatelsen for hver type tillatelse som finnes i settene `Intersect` -metoden; den resulterende tillatelsen er inkludert i de resulterende <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: Permission types that exist in only one of the two sets are excluded from the resulting set.
trans-unit.target: Tillatelsestyper som finnes i ett av de to settene er utelatt fra settet.

trans-unit.source: A permission set to intersect with the current <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En tillatelse satt til intersect med gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new permission set that represents the intersection of the current <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> and the specified target.
trans-unit.target: Et nytt tillatelsessett som representerer skjæringspunktet for gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> og angitt mål.

trans-unit.source: This object is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis skjæringspunktet er tom.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> is empty.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> er tom.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> can be empty and yet contain instances of permissions if those permissions are in the fully-restricted state.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>kan være tomt og enda har forekomster av tillatelser hvis disse tillatelsene er i tilstanden fullstendig begrenset.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: Permissions are in a fully restricted state if their `IsSubsetOf` methods return `true` when `null` is passed as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Tillatelsene som er i en fullstendig begrenset tilstand hvis de `IsSubsetOf` metoder returnere `true` når `null` sendes som en parameter.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> is empty; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> er tom; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om samlingen er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> cannot be read-only, so this property is always `false`.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>kan ikke være skrivebeskyttet, slik at denne egenskapen alltid `false`.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> is a subset of the specified <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Avgjør om gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> er et delsett av den angitte <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> is a subset of the target <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> if all demands that succeed for the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> also succeed for the target.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>er et delsett av målet <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>Hvis alle behovene som lykkes den <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>også lykkes for målet.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: That is, the target contains at least the permissions contained in the subset.
trans-unit.target: Det vil si inneholder målet minst tillatelser i delsettet.

trans-unit.source: The permission set to test for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: Tillatelsen som er angitt til å teste mot delsett-relasjonen.

trans-unit.source: This must be either a <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Security.NamedPermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Dette må være enten en <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Security.NamedPermissionSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: if the current is a subset of the target parameter; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis gjeldende er et delsett av den target parameteren; ellers .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is guaranteed to be thread safe.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om samlingen garanteres skal tråd trygt.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> does not automatically handle thread safety, so this property is always `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>automatisk håndterer ikke tråd sikkerhet, slik at denne egenskapen alltid `false`.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: This method is required to support <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nødvendig for å støtte <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Unrestricted" name="Unrestricted" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> er <xref uid="langword_csharp_Unrestricted" name="Unrestricted" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An `Unrestricted`<xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> effectively contains all permissions that implement the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission> interface.
trans-unit.target: En `Unrestricted` <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>effektivt inneholder alle tillatelser som implementerer den <xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Unrestricted" name="Unrestricted" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Unrestricted" name="Unrestricted" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Causes any <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.Demand*> that passes through the calling code for any <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> that is not a subset of the current <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> to fail.
trans-unit.target: Gjør eventuelle <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.Demand*>som går gjennom kall koden for noen <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> som er ikke et delsett av gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> mislykkes.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.Demand*>

trans-unit.source: PermitOnly is similar to <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.Deny%2A>, in that both cause stack walks to fail when they would otherwise succeed.
trans-unit.target: PermitOnly ligner <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.Deny%2A>, ved at både føre til at stakk hjelper mislykkes når de vil ellers lykkes.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.Deny%2A>

trans-unit.source: The difference is that <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.Deny%2A> specifies permissions that will cause the stack walk to fail, but PermitOnly specifies the only permissions that do not cause the stack walk to fail.
trans-unit.target: Forskjellen er at <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.Deny%2A>angir tillatelser som vil føre til at stakken vise mislykkes, men PermitOnly angir bare tillatelser som gir stakk gå mislykkes.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.Deny%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call this method to ensure that your code can be used to access only the specified resources.
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden for å sikre at koden kan brukes til å få tilgang til de angitte ressursene.

trans-unit.source: PermitOnly is ignored for a permission not granted because a demand for that permission cannot succeed.
trans-unit.target: PermitOnly ignoreres for en tillatelse ikke gitt fordi et behov for å få denne tillatelsen ikke kan fullføres.

trans-unit.source: However, if code lower on the call stack later calls <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.Demand%2A> for that permission, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when the stack walk reaches the code that tried to call PermitOnly.
trans-unit.target: Men hvis kode lavere til samtalen stable senere kall <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.Demand%2A>for denne tillatelsen en <xref:System.Security.SecurityException>forårsakes når stakk gå når kode som prøvde å ringe PermitOnly.</xref:System.Security.SecurityException> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.Demand%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is because the code that called PermitOnly has not been granted the permission, even though it called PermitOnly for that permission.
trans-unit.target: Dette er fordi koden som kalles PermitOnly ikke har blitt gitt tillatelse, selv om den kalles PermitOnly for denne tillatelsen.

trans-unit.source: The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack.
trans-unit.target: Kallstakken representeres vanligvis som voksende ned, slik at metoder høyere i kallstakken kalle metoder lavere i kallstakken.

trans-unit.source: Removes a permission of a certain type from the set.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner en tillatelse for en bestemt type fra gruppen.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > You cannot remove permissions from an unrestricted permission set.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT]> Du kan ikke fjerne tillatelser fra et sett med ubegrenset tilgang.

trans-unit.source: The permission set remains unrestricted after you attempt to remove the permission, and an exception is not thrown.
trans-unit.target: Tillatelsen angi forblir ubegrenset når du prøver å fjerne tillatelse, og et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The following C# code attempts to remove the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission> from the `FullTrust` permission set, but the permission is not removed.
trans-unit.target: Følgende C# kode forsøker å fjerne den <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission>fra den `FullTrust` angis, men tillatelsen fjernes ikke.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission>

trans-unit.source: The type of permission to delete.
trans-unit.target: Hva slags tillatelse til å slette.

trans-unit.source: The permission removed from the set.
trans-unit.target: Tillatelsen som er fjernet fra gruppen.

trans-unit.source: The method is called from a <xref href="System.Security.ReadOnlyPermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden kalles fra en <xref href="System.Security.ReadOnlyPermissionSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes a permission of a certain type from the set.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner en tillatelse for en bestemt type fra gruppen.

trans-unit.source: The RemovePermissionImpl method is the implementation for the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.RemovePermission%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RemovePermissionImpl er implementering for den <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.RemovePermission%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.RemovePermission%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > You cannot remove permissions from an unrestricted permission set.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Du kan ikke fjerne tillatelser fra et sett med ubegrenset tilgang.

trans-unit.source: The permission set remains unrestricted after you attempt to remove the permission, and an exception is not thrown.
trans-unit.target: Tillatelsen angi forblir ubegrenset når du prøver å fjerne tillatelse, og et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The type of the permission to remove.
trans-unit.target: Hva slags tillatelse til å fjerne.

trans-unit.source: The permission removed from the set.
trans-unit.target: Tillatelsen som er fjernet fra gruppen.

trans-unit.source: The method is called from a <xref href="System.Security.ReadOnlyPermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden kalles fra en <xref href="System.Security.ReadOnlyPermissionSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Causes any previous <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert*> for the current frame to be removed and no longer be in effect.
trans-unit.target: Normaliseres alle tidligere <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert*>for gjeldende bilde som skal fjernes og lenger er gyldig.</xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert*>

trans-unit.source: If there is no <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A> for the current frame, an <xref:System.ExecutionEngineException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingen <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>for gjeldende bilde, en <xref:System.ExecutionEngineException>forårsakes.</xref:System.ExecutionEngineException> </xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert%2A>

trans-unit.source: There is no previous <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert*> for the current frame.
trans-unit.target: Det er ikke tidligere <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert*>for gjeldende ramme.</xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Assert*>

trans-unit.source: Sets a permission to the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>, replacing any existing permission of the same type.
trans-unit.target: Angir en tillatelse for den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref>, å erstatte eksisterende tilgang av samme type.

trans-unit.source: This method removes any existing permission object of the same type from the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> and replaces it with the `perm` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden, fjernes alle eksisterende tillatelse objekt av samme type fra den <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>, og erstatter den med den `perm` parameteren.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: If a permission that implements <xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission> is set on a <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> that is <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>, the resulting <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> is no longer `Unrestricted`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en tillatelse som implementerer <xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission>er angitt for en <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>som <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>, den resulterende <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>er ikke lenger `Unrestricted`.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission>

trans-unit.source: The permission to set.
trans-unit.target: Tillatelse til å angi.

trans-unit.source: The set permission.
trans-unit.target: Angi tillatelse.

trans-unit.source: The method is called from a <xref href="System.Security.ReadOnlyPermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden kalles fra en <xref href="System.Security.ReadOnlyPermissionSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets a permission to the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>, replacing any existing permission of the same type.
trans-unit.target: Angir en tillatelse for den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref>, å erstatte eksisterende tilgang av samme type.

trans-unit.source: The SetPermissionImpl method is the implementation for the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.SetPermission%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SetPermissionImpl er implementering for den <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.SetPermission%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.SetPermission%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method removes any existing permission object of the same type from the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> and replaces it with the `perm` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden, fjernes alle eksisterende tillatelse objekt av samme type fra den <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>, og erstatter den med den `perm` parameteren.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: If a permission that implements <xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission> is set on a <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> that is <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>, the resulting <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> is no longer `Unrestricted`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en tillatelse som implementerer <xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission>er angitt for en <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>som <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>, den resulterende <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>er ikke lenger `Unrestricted`.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission>

trans-unit.source: The permission to set.
trans-unit.target: Tillatelse til å angi.

trans-unit.source: The set permission.
trans-unit.target: Angi tillatelse.

trans-unit.source: The method is called from a <xref href="System.Security.ReadOnlyPermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden kalles fra en <xref href="System.Security.ReadOnlyPermissionSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the root object of the current collection.
trans-unit.target: Henter rotobjekt for gjeldende samling.

trans-unit.source: This method is required to support <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nødvendig for å støtte <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The root object of the current collection.
trans-unit.target: Rotobjekt for gjeldende samling.

trans-unit.source: Runs when the entire object graph has been deserialized.
trans-unit.target: Kjører når diagrammet hele objektet har blitt deserialiseres.

trans-unit.source: The object that initiated the callback.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som startet tilbakeringing.

trans-unit.source: The functionality for this parameter is not currently implemented.
trans-unit.target: Funksjonaliteten for denne parameteren er ikke implementert.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en streng som representerer den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The string representation is useful in debugging to see the state of a <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.
trans-unit.target: Strengrepresentasjon er nyttige ved feilsøking for å vise statusen for en <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: A representation of the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En representasjon av den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en XML-koding sikkerhet og den gjeldende tilstanden.

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: XML-koding av sikkerhetsobjekt, inkludert tilstandsinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> that is the union of the current <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> and the specified <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> som Unionen av gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> og det angitte <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The result of a call to Union is a <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> that represents all the operations represented by the current <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> as well as all the operations represented by the specified <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet av et kall til Union er en <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>som representerer alle operasjoner som er representert av de gjeldende <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>og alle operasjoner som er representert av den angitte <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: If either set is `Unrestricted`, the union is `Unrestricted` as well.
trans-unit.target: Hvis enten er `Unrestricted`, sammenslåingen er `Unrestricted` også.

trans-unit.source: The permission set to form the union with the current <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tillatelsen som er satt til utgjør union med gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new permission set that represents the union of the current <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> and the specified <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Et nytt tillatelsessett som representerer Unionen av gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> og det angitte <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref>.
